metadata.title: CVE-2019-10103 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA projects created using the Kotlin (JS Client/JVMServer) IDE Template were resolving Gradle artifacts using an httpconnection, potentially allowing an MITM attack. This issue, which wasfixed in Kotlin plugin version 1.3.30, is similar to CVE-2019-10101.

criterions.comment: intellij-community-idea package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
